DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effectiveness 3 dose strength CT327 ointment ( 0.05 % , 0.1 % 0.05 % w/w ) compare placebo , apply twice daily 8 week , psoriatic plaque patient psoriasis vulgaris .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Efficacy , Safety Toleration CT327 Ointment Patients With Psoriasis Vulgaris
